about_the_game:
Multiplayer Tank-Centric Tactical-Combat Battle Arena

Alternate WWII Universe: Extraterrestrials have already made contact, and war machines are powered by stolen Alien Technology!

Tank Abilities:

  • Jump!  [SPACE key]
  • Turbo!  [SHIFT]
  • Float and Jet through water!
  • Rocket-Propel through the air!

Features:

  • Multiplayer!  10-Player Rooms
  • Unlock 4 Tanks to accord with your play style
  • Choose from 4 Maps:  Forest, Desert, Bayou, or Military Base  (more maps on the way!)
  • Upgrade Attributes like:  Speed, Turbo Recharge, Reload Speed, Cannon Damage, ..

    In this multiplayer tactical-combat action game, command an Alternate-Universe World War II Tank powered by stolen alien technology!

    Control a monstrous flying war machine to Capture the Flag at rocket-powered velocities. Soar over your enemies and crush your rivals into submission.


    Current features:

    · Choose from 4 iconic tanks, each with their own special strengths – Panzer IV (German), Tiger (German), T-90 (Russian), and Abrams (USA)

    · Upgrade slots for speed, gun damage, gun recharge, shield, shield recharge, turbo, and turbo recharge – tune your death machine to your playstyle

    · Competitive, Brutal, Fast-Paced Action with up to 12 online players

    · War zones covering desert, riverbank, bayou, military base, and icelandic environments

    · Chat with your team to coordinate tactical maneuvers and strategic role assignments

    · Leaderboard : Top 200

    · Friendly and Helpful Tank Off Discord Community – learn from the veterans and make friends!



    Upcoming features:

    · E-Sports tournament-style mode

    · Regular content updates for maps and tank types

name: Tank Off

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 equivalent or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
